headline: Global Participants Hedge Oil Risk at Record Levels Across ICE’s Canadian Crude and Midland WTI (HOU) Markets Through January 2026
summary: CALGARY, Canada & HOUSTON, February 06, 2026--Intercontinental Exchange, Inc. (NYSE:ICE), a leading global provider of technology and data and home to the most liquid energy markets in the world, today announced that January 2026 saw record trading activity in ICE’s Midland WTI (HOU) and Canadian crude oil markets as customers manage the impact on oil flows from the return of Venezuela as an oil exporter.
